data.message: What can I do when your Help pages isn't helping me resolve my issue?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out to us, Stephen. This is a great place to ask questions. Please let us know how we can help. -Joe
Facebook I have an issue with a page I no longer have access to because it's connected to a deactivated account. I want to merge that page with a new one for I have started.
Facebook Can you help me with this?

Hi Stephen. If the Page is unmanaged, you'll see Unofficial Page below its cover photo. You can then request to claim the Page and become its admin, or merge the Page into a Page you already manage for your business: http://bit.ly/2lrT7Yp. However, if the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. If this is the case, you can report the Page: http://bit.ly/2lrO0Y6. -Jessica

Facebook Thanks, the page is apparently managed since I can't see "unofficial Page" anywhere. I looked at all the report options and none of them fits my situation, the closest one is trademark infringement, but I don't know if I want to do that considering the page was started from a deactivated account of mine.
Hey Stephen. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2lsv9w3. Thanks! -Zack
